Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Dashboard modernization with all workflows support

Major improvements:
- Added support for ALL 5 workflows: FNB, ABSA, Kazang, Bidvest, Corporate

- Professional workflow breakdown cards with color coding
- Match distribution pie chart \(Perfect, Fuzzy, Foreign, Split, Unmatched\)
- Workflow comparison bar chart
- Recent activity feed tracking all workflows
- Session history with filtering by workflow type
- Batch downloads from current session or historical sessions
- Direct CSV download buttons for matched/unmatched data
- Modern CSS styling with gradients and shadows
- Removed all unnecessary st.rerun\(\) calls to prevent flickering
- Backward compatible render_session_history\(\) function
